Yeo Enk LouiLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Hey there!Perhaps you could check out these few books1) An Introduction to Quantitative Finance by Stephen Blyth2) Quantitative Momentum by Wesley R. Gray & Jack R. Vogel1 comment0

Leonard Tan14 Mar 2019Also check out Quantitative Value by Wesley Gray as well! Its especially pertinent to value investors who want to marry some quantitative aspects into their investment decisions.
